name: Gem Hoops
description: 1.75 inch 14k gold fill hoops are hand formed and wire wrapped with AAAA peridot briolettes.  Peridot is August's birthstone.  Just gorgeous.

name: Pendulum Earrings
description:
Some stones don't need any foofaraw; just a simple setting for them to shine.  This is my pendulum collection, where I am finally releasing some of my favorite stones (I'm a gem hoarder and the prettier they are, the harder to let go).  14k gold fill with AAAA faceted pink topaz oval beads.  Big and beautiful, these measure 13x15mm.  Roughly 3 inches in length, including the leverback ear wires.  

Also available:

Huge, sumptuous freshwater coin pearls (second photo) measuring 20mm in diameter.  Spectacular!  Almost 3.5 inches long, including the leverback ear wires.  

Carnelian rings wire wrapped with blue quartz coins (third photo) measuring 20mm in diameter.  3 inches long.  French ear hooks.  

I like my earrings long and dramatic...If you'd like them a little shorter, message me about a custom pair.

options.name: Freshwater Coin Pearl in 14k Gold Fill
Freshwater Coin Pearl in Sterling Silver

name: Pearl Trapeze Earrings
description: Huge sumptuous Biwa freshwater pearls are wrapped in a layer of wire crochet and accented with 13x23mm rose quartz briolettes.  Just over 1.25 inches wide and 2.5 inches long.  So pretty.

name: Caged Aquamarine Necklace
description: Semi-circle aquamarine stone is caged in crocheted wire and suspended from an 18 inch chain.  14k gold fill.  Spring ring clasp.  Made to order; expect variation.

name: Black Peacock Earrings
description: Black agate hoops are wire wrapped to 14k gold fill hoops and finished off with a black spinel briolette.  French ear wires.  1" wide, 2.5" long.

name: Crochet Medallion Earrings
description: Fine gauge wire is crocheted into a lacy medallion and suspended from French hook ear wires. Roughly 2" in diameter. Available in bronze (shown), sterling silver or 14k gold fill.

name: St. Tropez
description:
14k gold filled circles are wire wrapped with tiny Sleeping Beauty Turquoise rounds and finished off with wire wrapped amethyst nuggets.  
Wear these with a tan.  

Roughly 2" long, including leverback ear wires.  Amethyst nuggets are roughly 12x16mm.

name: Turquoise Dagger Hoops
description:
14k gold fill wire wrapped hoops are accented with a wire wrapped turquoise dagger.  

Hoops are 7/8" in diameter.  Spear length will vary, though I will try to accommodate special requests if you want them on the shorter or longer side.

name: Fringed Daggers
description: One of a kind:  14k gold fill hoops wire wrapped with turquoise dagger beads and chain fringe.

name: Caprice
description: <bold>Limited Edition</bold>: 18 gauge wire is wrought into teardrops and festooned with a flower and chain fringe.  Suspended from hand formed ear wires.  Copper and sterling silver.  3.5 inches long, including ear wires.

name: Pretty in Pink
description:
Elongated and textured 14k gold fill ear wires are decorated with wire wrapped rose quartz nuggets that are exceptionally translucent.  

Roughly 2.75" in length overall.  Nuggets are approximately 13x18mm.  

Made to order; expect slight variation.

name: Crochet Medallion Necklace
description: Fine gauge wire is crocheted into a lacy medallion and suspended from delicate cable chain.  Roughly 2" in diameter.  16" or 18" chain.

name: Bead Chain Hoops
description: 18 gauge 14k gold fill hoops (2.5" diameter) are wire wrapped with bead chain.  Large and in charge.

name: Dreamcatcher Earrings
description: Sterling silver rings are wrapped in fine gauge .999 silver crochet wire and suspended from delicate cable chain.  French hook ear wires.  Roughly 2.5" in length.

name: Scales
description:
Still playing with brass semi-circles.  This time 15 pieces are hand cut and filed, given a brushed finish, and linked using sterling silver jump rings to form a substantial bib, reminiscent of fish scales.   

Semi-circles are 15x7mm, bib measures roughly 3 inches wide and 1.5 inches long. Suspended from a sterling silver chain. 18" long.

name: Brass Scallop Bib Necklace
description:
Brass semi circles are hand cut and filed, given a textured edge and brushed finish, and linked using sterling silver jump rings to form a lovely scalloped bib.  Simple yet eye-catching.  

Semi-circles are 22x15mm, bib measures roughly 2.75 inches wide and 1.75 inches long.  Suspended from a sterling silver chain.  17.5" long.
_____________________

Copper and brass necklaces and earrings have been treated with Renaissance Wax Polish, which was developed by the British Museum in the early 1950s for fine art conservation. Renaissance Wax is a blend of highly refined micro-crystalline fossil-origin waxes. It will retard the oxidation process on your copper jewelry, but you can also take further precautions by storing your jewelry in the plastic baggie it arrives in when you are not wearing it.

name: Copper Scallop Necklace
description: Limited Edition: This is a smaller version of the Brass Scallop Bib Necklace, in which little scallops were hand cut from copper sheet, linked together with sterling silver jump rings and suspended from sterling silver cable chain. Bib is 1.25" wide and .75" long. Chain is 16" (necklace measures roughly 17" with the addition of the copper bib). I made these first before moving on to the brass version. I only have a couple left and then they're gone.

name: Copper Ruffle
description: Sterling silver hoops are wrapped with copper wire ruffles and then wrapped again with fine gauge sterling silver wire accented with sterling seamless beads.  Feminine and earthy.  2" in diameter.

name: Caged Pearl Necklace
description: A plump, sumptuous freshwater coin pearl is wrapped in a cage of fine gauge wire crochet and suspended from delicate cable chain.  16" or 18" chain available.  14k gold fill or sterling silver.

name: Caged Pearl Earrings
description: Plump sumptuous freshwater coin pearls are wrapped in a cage of wire crochet and suspended from delicate cable chain.  Leverback ear wires.  Made to order in 14k gold fill (shown) or sterling silver.  Also available with pyrite beads (shown in second photo).

name: Geometry I
description: Huge brass open triangles are hinged with jump rings and suspended from 14k gold fill ear wires.  3.5" long (including ear wire) and 1.5" wide.  Make a statement.

name: Geometry II
description: Brass triangles are hinged with jump rings and suspended from 14k gold fill ear wires.  Two sizes:  small (just under 2" long and .75" wide) and medium (2.5" long and .5" wide).  More sizes coming.

name: Bramble Necklace II
description: Limited Edition:  14k gold fill version of the original Bramble Necklace, this one small and delicate, measuring 9/16ths of an inch wide and half an inch long.  Suspended from a 16" cable chain.  Great for layering.

name: Bramble Necklace
description: Limited edition: sterling silver hoop is hand forged and haphazardly wrapped with fine gauge wire, oxidized and polished to show texture. Suspended from oxidized sterling silver cable chain. Just under 1" in diameter. Also available in large (roughly 2" diameter). Overall length of necklace is roughly 18 inches. Also available with a copper hoop (shown in last photo). Made to order; clasp may vary (toggle, lobster claw or S-hook). Also available in gold fill (Bramble Necklace II).

name: Bramble Hoops
description:
Sterling silver hoops are hand forged and haphazardly wrapped with wire, oxidized and polished to show texture. Roughly 2 inches in diameter.

Made to order; expect slight variation.  Please allow extra time for delivery.

name: Crochet Hair Bow
description:
Sparkly purple crocheted hair bow attached to a sturdy (and strong) alligator clip.  Roughly 3.25"x1.75".  

Also available in green, orange (photo coming soon) and flaming pink (these bows are larger -- 4.25"x2").  More colors to come!

name: The Simple Things
description: A sweet flower crocheted from light dusky gray thread and attached to a black bobby pin.  Flower is less than 1" in diameter.  Also available in other colors (see additional photos).

name: Ruffle Hoops
description:
Sterling silver hoops are hand formed and embellished with 24 gauge sterling silver wire in a lacy scallop design. Sweetness.

Also available in copper and sterling silver (shown in 3rd photo).

Just over 1.5 inches in diameter.  Made to order; expect slight variation and please allow extra time for delivery.

name: Be Mine
description:
Sweet little hearts are hand formed using sterling silver 20 gauge square wire.  Post earrings, these will arrive with rubber backs.  Also available in 14k gold fill.  

Roughly 10x15mm.  Made to order; due to the handmade nature of this item, size and shape will vary slightly.

name: Reminder Earrings
description:
Cute little bows formed from square 14k gold filled wire.  Post earrings; rubber backs.  Sweetness.

Also available in sterling silver.

Roughly 20mm wide.  Due to the handmade nature of this item, slight variations in size and shape will occur.

name: Petite Hoops
description:
Classic hoops go one step further with wire wrapping for a little added texture and heft. 3/4 of an inch in diameter. Perfect for daily wear.

Also available in sterling silver (shown in 3rd photo).

Made to order; please allow extra time for delivery.

name: Classic Dangle Hoops
description:
Classic hoops go one step further with wire wrapping for a little added texture and heft.  Wear them alone (see 2nd photo) or with the wire wrapped 12mm creamy Swarovski pearl dangles.

Also available in sterling silver.

Roughly 3/4 of an inch in diameter. 14k gold filled.  

Made to order; please allow extra time for delivery.

name: Paradigm Hoops
description:
Classic hoops go one step further with wire wrapping for a little added texture and heft.  Roughly 1.75 - 2 inches in diameter.   Sterling silver, oxidized.

Also available in 14k gold fill.

Made to order; please allow extra time for delivery.

name: Modern Hoops
description:
Now with thicker wire:

Hoop earrings go modern with the addition of posts.  Thick (14 gauge) sterling silver wire is hand forged into hoops and given a hammered finish.  Roughly 2" in diameter.

Made to order; expect slight variation and please allow extra time for delivery.  

Available with rubber post backs or sterling silver friction nuts.

name: Sweet Nothings
description:
11mm brushed sterling silver flowers adorn post earrings.  The ultimate in girly.

Available with 3mm sterling silver ball post earring or 4mm 14k gold filled ball post earring.

name: Essentials
description:
Thick gauge sterling silver bead wire is hammered into hoops, oxidized and brushed for added texture.  

Roughly 1.5 inches wide and 2.25 inches long.

name: Copper Lace
description:
Hoops are hand formed using 20 gauge sterling silver wire and festooned with tiny round copper beads (using fine gauge sterling silver wire) in a lacy scallop design.  Oxidized and polished to highlight texture.

Roughly 2 inches wide in diameter.  Made to order; please allow extra time for delivery.

These earrings were formerly made in a long oval shape (shown in 3rd photo).  If you prefer that shape, contact me.

name: Azure Hoops
description: Limited Edition: hoops are hand formed using 19 gauge sterling silver wire and festooned with little turquoise barrel beads. Roughly 1.75 inches in diameter. These are getting ready to be phased out as I am on my last couple of strands of turquoise. Made to order; please allow extra time for delivery.

name: First Blush
description: Sterling silver rings are wire wrapped and serve as bezels for dusky pink conch shell buttons.  12x14mm pink opal briolettes finish off the look.  Suspended from leverback earrings.  5/8ths of an inch wide at widest point; just over 2 inches long.

name: Serenity
description:
Large sterling silver hoop festooned with varying sizes of white freshwater pearls.  Oxidized and polished to highlight the wire wrapping and make the pearls pop.  1.75 inches in diameter; suspended from a delicate 18 inch cable chain, fastens with a lobster claw clasp.   

Made to order; expect natural variation.  Please allow extra time for delivery.

name: Saffron
description:
Chunky faceted citrine nuggets are embellished with a little 14k goldfill wire and finished off with deep purple amethyst briolettes.  Suspended from French ear hooks.  

Roughly 1.75 inches long and .75 inches wide at widest point.  Made to order; natural variation will occur.  Please allow extra time for delivery.

name: Cyprus
description: Substantial 16mm faceted blue chalcedony rondelles are showcased simply on hand formed 14k gold fill hoops which fasten behind the bead.  Accented with brushed gold vermeil bead caps. Just under 1.75 inches in length.

name: Rosebuds
description:
Sterling silver wire is twisted into plump rosebud stud earrings. Oxidized and then sanded to highlight the wire work. Roughly 1/2 an inch in diameter.

Made to order; no two pair are ever alike. Please allow extra time for delivery.

Available with rubber post backs or sterling silver friction nuts.

name: Twist & Shout
description:
Sturdy 19 gauge square 14k gold filled wire is twisted into a sculptural helix.  The wire locks in place (when you receive them, one will be open, one locked, so you can see how to work them), ensuring they won't get lost.  Ultra-lightweight.  Great for daily wear.  I'm living in mine.

Roughly 2.5 inches in length.  Made to order; expect slight variation.

Also available in sterling silver.

name: Bubbles
description: Limited edition sterling silver circles festooned with varying sizes of white freshwater pearls. Oxidized and polished to highlight the wire wrapping and make the pearls pop. 1.5 inches in diameter; post earrings with sterling silver friction nuts.

name: Copper Daisy
description:
Copper wire is formed into a simple daisy, hammered for texture and strength, and suspended from delicate sterling silver cable chain.  Oxidized and brushed with steel wool for a rustic Fall look.  Hand formed French ear hooks (earrings will come with rubber backs to prevent loss).  Roughly 2.5 - 3 inches long, including ear hook.  Length can be customized if desired.

Made to order.  Due to the handmade nature of this item, variation is to be expected; no two blooms are ever alike in both size and shape (as shown in photos).

name: Samantha
description:
Sterling silver strips are wire wrapped with creamy white freshwater pearls and suspended from hand made French ear hooks (earrings will come with rubber backs to prevent loss).  Oxidized and brushed with steel wool to highlight texture.  Roughly 2.75 inches long, including ear hook.

Made to order; please allow extra time for delivery.  Due to the hand-made nature of this item, natural variation will occur.

name: Copper Bramble Drops
description:
Small copper hoops are hand forged and haphazardly wrapped with fine gauge wire, oxidized and polished to show texture. Suspended from oxidized sterling silver cable chain. Copper circles measure roughly 3/4 of an inch in diameter; length is roughly 2.75 inches, including ear wire.

Also available with leverback earwires.
